title: Indranil Manna - Quick Facts
text:
Indranil Manna
Department | Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
Research Area(s) | AICTE Career Award for Young Teacher (1998) Alexander von Humboldt Fellowship (2001) Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst (DAAD) Fellowship (1988) INSA Young Scientist Award (1996) Materials Research Society of India (MRSI) Medal (2000) Metallurgist of the Year Award of the Ministry of Steel and Mines at NMD-ATM of Institute of Metals (2002) Mout Medal Awarded for the successful completion of the Premchand Roychand Studentship (1998) Outstanding Refree Citation and Prize, Board of Acta Materialia Inc. (2000) Young Metallurgist Award of the Ministry of Steel and Mines (1991)
Year Joined | 1985
